entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %

Dewpoint: -19.4°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to periods of snow in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
